text:
@NBCNews I know it's not nice, but my first thought was "good."

I'm out of sympathy & empathy for anti-vaxxers, flat-Earthers, & all other anti-science people.

Darwinism may be the only answer.

So let them get COVID-19 & die or be permanently damaged. I bet they'll want Obamacare then.
